name: campus-lost-and-found
description: Campus Lost and Found Full-Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run install:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: echo "Server build completed - no build step needed for Node.js"
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:client: cd ../client && npm test || echo "No client tests configured"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:client: cd ../client && npm run lint || echo "No client linting configured"
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run start:client
